description: ExternalData describes the external data source to use for the mutation.

dataSource.description: DataSource specifies where to extract the data that will be sent to the external data provider as parameters.

default.description: Default specifies the default value to use when the external data provider returns an error and the failure policy is set to "UseDefault".

failurePolicy.description: FailurePolicy specifies the policy to apply when the external data provider returns an error.

provider.description: Provider is the name of the external data provider.
